sources.title: Carry On Cowboy
sources.description: Stodge City is terrorized by the villainous Johnny Finger, alias the Rumpo Kid. However, when Judge Burke asks for help to clean up the town, he is taken at his word, and instead of a lawman he is sent a sanitation engineer. Can Marshall P Knutt save the peace-loving community? Will the western genre ever be the same again?

metadata.Plot: Stodge City is in the grip of the Rumpo Kid and his gang. Mistaken identity again takes a hand as a "sanitary engineer" (plumber) by the name of Marshal P. Knutt is mistaken for a law marshal! Being the conscientious sort, Marshal tries to help the town get rid of Rumpo, and a showdown is inevitable. Marshal has two aids - revenge-seeking Annie Oakley and his sanitary expertise...
metadata.Actors: Sidney James, Kenneth Williams, Jim Dale
